title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions:
Introducing the Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles! This versatile shower brush is designed to provide a gentle yet effective cleaning experience for your skin.

The handle of this shower brush measures 17 inches in length and is made of high-quality wood. It features a non-slip rubber patch and a hanging rope, ensuring a secure grip and convenient storage.

The bristles of the brush are made from two different materials. The soft bristles are made of nylon and are specifically designed to gently clean and effectively wash your skin. The stiff bristles, made of natural materials, are perfect for exfoliating your skin. You can use the brush with both wet and dry brushing options, allowing you to customize your skincare routine.

In terms of maintenance, we recommend replacing the brush head every 3-6 months to ensure optimal performance. Additionally, it is recommended to clean the brush every few weeks to maintain hygiene.

The package includes one shower brush, providing you with everything you need for a refreshing and invigorating shower experience.

Upgrade your shower routine with the Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles today!
